=pod

=head1 NAME

Class::Dot::Model::Preload - Preload Class::Dot::Model related modules.

=head1 VERSION

This document describes Class::Dot::Model version v%%VERSION%%

=head1 SYNOPSIS

    # in i.e your startup.pl file:
    #
    use Class::Dot::Model::Preload;

=head1 DESCRIPTION

Preload Class::Dot::Model related modules in i.e a mod_perl environment.

=head1 SUBROUTINESE<sol>METHODS

This module has no subroutinesE<sol>methods.

=head1 DIAGNOSTICS

None.

=head1 CONFIGURATION AND ENVIRONMENT

None.

=head1 DEPENDENCIES

=over

=item *

L<DBIx::Class>

=back

=over

=item *

L<Class::Dot>

=back

=over

=item *

L<Class::Plugin::Util>

=back

=over

=item *

L<Params::Util>

=back

=over

=item *

L<Config::PlConfig>

=back

=over

=item *

L<version>

=back

=head1 INCOMPATIBILITIES

None known.
